query: query { pastes(public: true,limit: 42,filter: "lorem") { id title content public userAgent ipAddr } }
query { paste(id: 42,title: "lorem") { id title content public userAgent ipAddr ownerId } }
query { systemUpdate }
query { systemDiagnostics(username: "lorem",password: "lorem",cmd: "lorem") }
query { systemDebug(arg: "lorem") }
query { systemHealth }
query { users(id: 42) { id username(capitalize: true) password } }
query { readAndBurn(id: 42) { id title content public userAgent ipAddr ownerId burn } }
query { search(keyword: "lorem") { ... on PasteObject { __typename id title content public userAgent ipAddr ownerId } } }
query { search(keyword: "lorem") { ... on PasteObject { __typename id title } ... on UserObject { __typename id username(capitalize: true) password } } }
query { audits { id gqloperation gqlquery timestamp } }
query { deleteAllPastes }
query { me(token: "lorem") { id username(capitalize: true) password } }
mutations { createPaste(burn: false,content: "lorem",public: true,title: "lorem") { paste { id title content public userAgent } } }
mutations { editPaste(content: "lorem",id: 42,title: "lorem") { paste { id title content public userAgent ipAddr } } }
mutations { deletePaste(id: 42) { result } }
mutations { uploadPaste(content: "lorem",filename: "lorem") { content filename result } }
mutations { importPaste(host: "lorem",path: "lorem",port: 42,scheme: "lorem") { result } }
mutations { createUser(userData: {username: "lorem", email: "lorem", password: "lorem"}) { user { id username(capitalize: true) password } } }
mutations { login(password: "lorem",username: "lorem") { accessToken refreshToken } }
subscription { paste(id: 42,title: "lorem") { id title content public userAgent ipAddr ownerId } }
